about_the_game:
Welcome to the Most Haunted Restaurant in Town!

In Slice, Suffer, Serve!, you’ve just landed the most unique job of your afterlife, serving ghostly customers at a restaurant. But they’re not known for their patience!—Slice up human ingredients and serve ghostly customers before they get too angry.

Get ready for a fast-paced, fun, and strange cooking game where you have to stay calm under pressure and keep your ghost customers happy. Make too many mistakes, and the ghosts might just haunt you!

Key Features

  • Midnight Madness: You’ll be serving from 6:00 PM to 6:00 AM, because, of course, ghosts like to eat at night!

  • Fast-Paced Fun: Quickly slice and serve while keeping your kitchen running smoothly under pressure. Can you manage the chaos before time runs out?

  • Four Chances: Ghosts are forgiving... to a point. You can afford a few slip-ups, but anger them too much and you’ll face the consequences. Make four mistakes, and it’s game over.

  • High Scores: Think you can make the perfect dish under pressure? Challenge yourself to earn the highest score, beating the clock and out-serving your ghostly competition. Only the best chefs can survive the night!

What You Can Expect

  • Unique Gameplay: Slice, Suffer, Serve! is a fast-paced slice-and-click game where you play as a chef preparing dishes from human body parts to serve ghostly customers. As orders pile up, the pressure builds, and you’ll need to stay sharp to avoid losing points.

  • Replayability: Every playthrough is a fresh challenge. With a focus on speed, accuracy, and quick thinking, you’ll have the chance to beat your personal high score each time you play. No two rounds are exactly the same!

  • Tension and Strategy: You get four chances to make mistakes, but once you reach your limit, the night ends. You’ll need to plan carefully, react quickly, and keep your cool under growing pressure to succeed.

  • Stylized Horror Setting with Folklore: The game’s spooky, haunted restaurant is brought to life with quirky, cartoonish visuals and eerie sound effects. Ghost customers from different countries and folklore add variety and keep the experience fresh and exciting.

Mature Content Description

This game includes cartoonish depictions of violence, such as slicing human body parts to serve as food to ghostly customers. While the art style is light-hearted and exaggerated, the game features themes of death and gore, which may not be suitable for all audiences.

content_descriptors.notes: Slice, Suffer, Serve! features cartoonish depictions of violence, where players will slice human body parts to prepare meals for ghostly customers. The game’s visual style is exaggerated and not realistic, but the themes of death, dismemberment, and gore are present throughout gameplay. There are no depictions of sexual acts, drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, or any other sensitive topics like sexual assault or non-consensual acts. However, the violence and themes of death may be unsettling for some players.

name: Slice, Suffer, Serve!
reviews:
“Great game! A very complete package! Great concept, great execution, great sense of humor, great fun! Im really impressed with how it all came together. I think that's one of the hardest and most impressive things you can do in games (or any medium) is when everything fits together so well. The combination of Fruit Ninja + serving was really clever. And the way you get different items from slashing different parts of the body was great. And it was so intuitive which customers would want which item (Vampire = blood from the neck, zombies = brain from the head, and my favorite was the Krasue who wants poop lol). And the final twist of different levels of decay added more challenge without making the game more complex to understand. Everything was very intuitive. I think if you spend some more time polishing the game you could have a small hit on your hands! Really impressive work! I hope you all keep making games together!”
Art-eater
short_description: Slice, Suffer, Serve! is a 2D slice-and-click game where you play as a chef, preparing dishes for ghost customers. Sell as many dishes as possible and try not to let the customers get angry! What are you waiting for, new employee? Serve spooky dishes to ghostly guests—quickly!!!
